flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=516>>516
So he makes 516*25=$<<516*25=12900>>12900 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 12900*4=$<<12900*4=51600>>51600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156.0, not 516.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
